chapters.title: Chapter 44: HuntedChapter 45: Caemlyn
chapters.info: Lord Gaebril, p. 528 (423)—New advisor to Queen Morgase of Andor, selected as Elaida's replacement. Gareth Bryne did not like him all that much, so Bryne was dismissed to his farm. Gaebril plans to invade Cairhien, since Morgase has a claim to the Sun Throne by her marriage to Taringail Damodred. Mat overheard him talking to Comar about orders to kill Elayne. See also Comar; Trakand, Morgase.
